testcase.name: Correct Login
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Sauce Demo website login page..............................passed When user enters the correct username and password..........................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then homepage should be displayed...........................................passed

testcase.name: Incorrect Login
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Sauce Demo website login page..............................passed When user enters the incorrect username and password........................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then error meaages should be displayed......................................passed

testcase.name: product list
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed Then user should be able to see 6 product in the list.......................passed

testcase.name: product details
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on any product, details of that product should be displayed.passed

testcase.name: filter product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on filter button...........................................passed Then 4 filters should be displayed..........................................passed

testcase.name: add product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on add to cart button on first product.....................passed Then product should be added in your cart...................................passed

testcase.name: remove product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on add to cart button on first product.....................passed And user navigate to cart page and clicks on remove button of fisrt product.passed Then the product should get removed.........................................passed

testcase.name: add_multiple_product
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on add to cart button on first and second product..........passed Then 2 products should be added in your cart................................passed

testcase.name: successful order
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on add to cart button on first and second product..........passed Then 2 products should be added in your cart................................passed When user clicks on checkout and fills correct information on your information page.passed Then correct summary amount should be displayed in item total...............passed When user clicks on finish order should be placed with order placed message.passed

testcase.name: log_out
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to the login page.......................................passed When user submit username and password......................................passed Then user should be logged in...............................................passed Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user opens navigation menu.............................................passed And clicks on logout........................................................passed Then user should be logged out..............................................passed
